entries.entry: Match 5 colors in a row to create a Magic Color Power-up! Combine it with any Gem to break all Gems of the same color
Accomplish each level's objective and beat the target score to advance the story and unlock new levels.

Break all Chain tiles to complete the level.
You didn't light up the board.
If you're enjoying Maleficent Free Fall, please take a few moments to rate it.
Congratulations! You unlocked the Growing Thorns Power-up!
Drop the special items to the bottom of the board.
Combine two Power-ups to create a more powerful effect. Try it with these 2 Gem Power-ups!
Drop the special items to the bottom of the board.
Grow all the Thorns to complete the level.
Destroy them before they get to the top and burn the thorn wall!
Open link and exit the game?
Place the specific colored tile into the top of the bottle to fill it!
Now light up the rest of the board to complete the level!
Destroy the soldiers before they burn down the thorn wall.
Congratulations! You unlocked the Wing Wind power-up!
Come back and PLAY! You have a full set of lives!
Congratulations! You unlocked the Wolf power-up!
TIP: Having trouble reaching the target score? Make matches quickly to earn score multipliers.
Now select the Wing Wind Power-up to create a powerful wind that breaks random tiles.
Match colors in a "T" or "L" shape to create a Gem Power-up! Match it again to break all tiles around it.
You finished all levels! New levels coming SOON!
Break all Shields to completed the level.
Reach the target score before you run out of MOVES!
You finished all levels! New levels coming soon!
Here are the remaining number of tiles you have left to light up on the board.
You didn't reach the target score.
You can always get magic points by obtaining stars and replaying levels
Combine special Power-ups to unleash powerful effects.
Swipe the Gem to match 3 of the same color.
Select the Staff Power-up, then swipe across the board to break tiles.
Congratulations! You have unlocked the Staff Power-up!
Touch a tile and slide it with your finger. Match 3 tiles of the same color to break them.
You didn't eliminate all required tiles.
Make a match next to a thorn sprout to make it grow!
Here's <points> free Magic to use as you wish!

Match 4 colors in a row to create a Gem Power-up! Match it again to break all tiles in its path.
Congratulations! You unlocked a new Raven Power-up!
Swipe the tile to illuminate the board piece!

5 in T or L = Bomb Power-up
Use the Yellow Magic to add 5 more moves.
Match 4 or 5 tiles in different shapes to create different Gem Power-ups!

Tap the Magic Ball to display all Maleficent's Powers.
Now break all the Chain tiles to complete the level!
Select the Green Magic Power-up, then select any Gem to break all Gems of the same color.
Every move that you don't destroy a Soldier, they will move up one row.
